```{python}
import os
os.chdir("..")
```

```{python}
import polars as pl
import pandas as pd
```

```{python}
df = pl.read_csv("data/raw/transactions.csv")
df = df.filter((pl.col("transaction_trade") == "e"))
df = df.filter(pl.col("transaction_id").str.starts_with("21"))
df = df.group_by(pl.col("transaction_year")).agg(pl.col("vessel_value").cast(pl.Int64).sum().alias("vessel_value"))
df.sort("transaction_year")
```
